snippet.title: Spanish Prostitutes Wear Reflective Vests To Avoid Fines
snippet.description: In a move that is sure to lead to some awkward encounters with road crews, the Spanish government has ordered that prostitutes working on a roundabout outside the city of Lleida have to wear yellow reflective bibs or face a fine. A police spokesman said: "In the past couple of months the prostitutes have been fined for two reasons: for not wearing the reflective jacket and for creating danger on the public highway."
